title: Planner: Planner component in Microsoft Loop
description:
Users of Planner and Loop will be able to bring their plans into Loop-enabled apps as a Planner component. Using the power of Loop, you'll be able to view and edit a plan with Planner's board view in context with your other work. The component will first be available in the Loop app. Support for other Loop-enabled apps will follow.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/use-the-planner-component-in-loop-545e967a-7c69-4e9a-9458-dfabdcf1d752
